title: Can't gift RP
body: Tried to gift RP to a friend and it went back to the "Choose Recipient" screen. Rito pls.

replies.body:
Hey there,

* Are you presented with an error at all when this occurs?
* Have you attempted to restart your client and then send the gift? has this succeeded?

Could you try [resetting your Windows Internet Options](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-#wq3) and let me know if that helps.
